verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: You feel forgotten like no one cares anymore

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
You’re all alone working hard,
faithful to the Lord

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
But you’re starting to grow weary so
I’m here to say take heart

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
God sees where you’re serving.
He knows who you are.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: The eyes of heaven move through the world today

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: That our God may give strength to hearts of faith

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: They never miss a moment, stay faithful and true

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: For the eyes of heaven see you.

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: We all have seasons when it seems we’ve labored long

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: And we start to feel like our souls begin to lose their song

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: But let your heart take comfort and courage from His Word

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: Hope has a revival when we trust the truth we’ve heard.

verse.name: c1j
verse.lines: Keep on serving boldly for you are in His sight

verse.name: c1k
verse.lines: Keep teaching the Word, keep telling the lost, being salt and light.
